text:
September 6, 1963
Mrs* Robert L. Allen
70 LaSalle Street
Apartment 13F
New York 27, Hew York
Dear Mrs* Allen:
Enclosed are eleven more Voice of America Radio English Teaching scripts
for your perusal*
The remaining five scripts in the series should be in the mail as soon as
they are completed*
Sincerely,
James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
JAFjsc
